0.text: Through the rising sea levels, the volatile and chaotic weather, and the struggle to survive, one player remains: %1$s.

140.text: Those who have fallen have been swept away by the encroaching tides that engulf countless landmasses in this dire future.

280.text: The lone survivor of this city, %1$s, has won - but at what cost? The world is not what it once was, and they must survive in this new apocalyptic land.

420.text: What would you do different next time? Together, we could stop this from becoming our future.
